title: Update hero section tagline to premium outfit messaging

requirements.text: In the ProductCatalog page hero section, change the tagline text from 'DISCOVER PREMIUM TECHNOLOGY' to 'MAKE YOUR OWN CHOICE WITH PREMIUM OUTFIT'

quotes: CHANGE FROM "DISCOVER PREMIUM TECHNOLOGY " TO "MAKE YOUR OWN CHOICE WITH PREMIUM OUTFIT".

acceptanceCriteria: The hero section displays 'MAKE YOUR OWN CHOICE WITH PREMIUM OUTFIT' as the tagline
The text 'DISCOVER PREMIUM TECHNOLOGY' is completely removed from the page
The visual styling and layout of the hero section remain unchanged

nonGoals: Changing any other text on the page
Modifying the hero section layout or styling
